reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Reducing Carbon Emissions of Industrial Facilities in the Southeast Anatolia Region of Turkey

description.narrative: The project aims to increase awareness in Turkey's South-Eastern Anatolia Region of the benefits of improved industrial energy efficiency and to pave the way for the application of energy conservation and carbon reduction opportunities in industrial premises. The project will facilitate expertise and knowledge transfer from the UK in relation to technologies for energy efficiency and provide links to UK businesses for future technology transfer opportunities, assisting sustainable economic development.
